
Question
========
On one standardized measure of IQ, $\mu = 100$ and $\sigma = 15$. A sample of 36 students who have college-educated parents is randomly selected and the mean is 110. 

What is the 95% confidence interval for the mean IQ of students who have college educated parents?

Answerlist
----------
* (95.1, 104.9)
* (105.1, 114.9)
* (70.6, 139.4)
* (105.9, 114.1)
